title: Hawaii Firm Recalls Chicken Caesar Salads Due To Misbranding and Undeclared Allergens
summary: Editor’s Note August 30, 2011: This release is being reissued to expand the August 26, 2011 recall to include additional products marked with an asterisk (*). WASHINGTON, Aug. 30, 2011 - So Ono Food Products, a Honolulu, Hawaii establishment, is expanding its recall of chicken...
impacted_products: 9.5-oz. containers of “SO ONO FRESH CAESAR SALAD WITH CHICKEN,” with a Use By date of 09/01/11 through 09/04/11 located on a sticker in the top left corner of the package.*
12-oz. plastic containers of “Signature Café GRILLED CHICKEN CAESAR SALAD,” with a Use By date of 08/26/11 through 09/02/2011 located on a sticker in the top left corner of the package.
